mapper.insert: insert into jf_record (user_id, source_id, score, note, expire, add_time, update_time, operator, add_date) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expire,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT jr.add_time, js.action, js.action_desc, js.score, jr.note FROM jf_record jr LEFT JOIN jf_rule js ON jr.source_id = js.id WHERE jr.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT SUM(js.score) FROM jf_record jr LEFT JOIN jf_rule js ON jr.source_id = js.id WHERE jr.expire = 0 AND jr.user_id = #{userId}
